Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: 21 Over the years , the use of the structural effect to enhance PSC performance has been extensively investigated , particularly the donor - acceptor ( D-A ) strategy , which has been proved to be an effective approach to develop donor polymers with wide absorption , low - lying energy levels , and enhanced electron properties.

Let's think step by step.

Sure! Here are the "Material Name" entities in the paragraph, presented in a Markdown table with one column "Material Name":

| --- |
| structural effect |
| donor-acceptor (D-A) strategy |
| donor polymers |
| acceptor polymers |

* "structural effect" (this term refers to a broader concept in materials science, rather than a specific material name)
* "wide absorption" (this is a property of a material, rather than a material name itself)

* "enhanced electron properties" (this is a property of a material, rather than a material name itself)
